trans-unit.source: Represents XML data stored in or retrieved from a server.

This class contains an instance of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>-derived type, and adds SQL-specific features such as database-style null semantics by implementing the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스의 인스턴스를 포함 한 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>-파생 된 유형인 및 null 의미 체계 데이터베이스 스타일 등의 SQL 관련 기능을 구현 하 여 추가 <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable> 인터페이스입니다.

trans-unit.source: When you use SqlXml, the XML value that you assign to the SqlXml instance must be consumable by an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: SqlXml을 사용 하는 경우 SqlXml 인스턴스에 할당 하는 XML 값에서 사용할 수 해야는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>합니다.

trans-unit.source: For unicode data, the Byte Order Mark (`BOM`) must be present in the stream of data.
trans-unit.target: 유니코드 데이터의 경우 바이트 순서 표시 (`BOM`)는 데이터 스트림의에 존재 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml" /> instance.
Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml" /> instance.
A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />-derived instance (such as <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" />) from which to load the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml" /> instance's Xml content.
Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml" /> instance, supplying the XML value from the supplied <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />-derived instance.
An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />-derived class instance to be used as the value of the new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml" /> instance.
Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml" /> instance and associates it with the content of the supplied <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
If this value is null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the instance is set so that <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable.IsNull%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 이 값이 null (`Nothing` Visual basic에서), 인스턴스 설정 되어 있도록 <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable.IsNull%2A> 반환 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the XML content of this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml" /> as a <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />-derived instance that contains the XML content.
The actual type may vary (for example, the return value might be <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextReader" />) depending on how the information is represented internally, on the server.
If the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> instance was initialized to null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), this method returns null.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> 인스턴스를 null로 초기화 (`Nothing` Visual basic에서),이 메서드는 null을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Attempt was made to access this property on a null instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
A string that indicates the XSD of the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
Indicates whether this instance represents a null <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml" /> value.
<see langword="true" /> if <see langword="Value" /> is null.
Otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Represents a null instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml" /> type.
A null instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml" /> type.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema" />.

An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> that describes the XML representation of the object that is produced by the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)" /> method and consumed by the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> method.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An XmlReader.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An XmlWriter
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string representation of the XML content of this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml" /> instance.
The string representation of the XML content.
To retrieve the content represented as an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>, call the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml.CreateReader%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 로 나타낸 콘텐츠를 검색 하는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>, 호출 된 <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml.CreateReader%2A> 메서드.
